name: ualfutures-frontend
description: Exploring the futures of creativity and learning where Technology meets Art, Design, Fashion, Communications and Performance.

scripts.favicon: node favicon.js && echo 'Now copy contents of favicon.html into your HTML files.'
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.compile: npm run compile:js && npm run compile:css
scripts.watch: http-server & open http://localhost:8080/ && onchange './stylesheets/style.less' './javascripts/!(script|main|mian.min|vendor/**).js' -v -- npm run compile
